messages.message: For redactor, a minor note: we have to make the functionality easily discoverable and visible even if the app disappears, so that sales people can talk about it, and can demo it. + @lydia

For OCR — we have to make the app usable/demo-able by our sales team, currently nobody can really click on the OCR app and use it [without really creating a flow]. In many demos — you have to on-the-fly show if the OCR engine bundled by Instabase can handle handwriting, skew, bad background, etc. So it’s a very important demo tool.
